greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Convolved with the toothpick sequence A139250 = (2*n - 1): (1, 3, 5, 7,...).
comment: The sequence convolved with (1, 2, 2, 2,...) = A139251, (1, 2, 4, 4, 4, 8, 12,...); i.e. first difference row of the toothpick sequence A139250.
link: David Applegate, Omar E. Pol and N. J. A. Sloane, The Toothpick Sequence and Other Sequences from Cellular Automata, Congressus Numerantium, Vol. 206 (2010), 157-191. [There is a typo in Theorem 6: (13) should read u(n) = 4.3^(wt(n-1)-1) for n >= 2.]
N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, May 25 2009
